columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AMBIENT_SESSION_SECTION_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the Ambient Note Section ID that was updated by the user. Points to I DXR 41500.

columns.name: AMBIENT_SESSION_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the Ambient Session ID that this HNO pulled in note section data from. Points to DXR.
